languages.text: "Не может быть! Сражайтесь отважно, соратники! Империум не забудет вас!" {n}Комиссар даже не пытается скрыть кривляющиеся глумливые нотки в голосе.{/n}
"It can't be! Fight valiantly, my comrades-in-arms! The Imperium will not forget you!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не может быть! Сражайтесь отважно, соратники! Империум не забудет вас!" {n}Комиссар даже не пытается скрыть кривляющиеся глумливые нотки в голосе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It can't be! Fight valiantly, my comrades-in-arms! The Imperium will not forget you!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

traits.locale_text: "It can't be! Fight valiantly, my comrades-in-arms! The Imperium will not forget you!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

traits.locale_text: "It can't be! Fight valiantly, my comrades-in-arms! The Imperium will not forget you!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: « Oh non, c'est impossible ! Battez-vous vaillamment, mes frères et sœurs d'armes ! L'Imperium n'oubliera pas votre sacrifice ! » {n}Le commissaire n'essaie même pas de dissimuler son sarcasme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It can't be! Fight valiantly, my comrades-in-arms! The Imperium will not forget you!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh non, c'est impossible ! Battez-vous vaillamment, mes frères et sœurs d'armes ! L'Imperium n'oubliera pas votre sacrifice ! » {n}Le commissaire n'essaie même pas de dissimuler son sarcasme.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: “这不可能！勇敢地战斗吧，我的战友们！帝国不会忘记你们！”{n}政委声音中的讥讽之意暴露无遗。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It can't be! Fight valiantly, my comrades-in-arms! The Imperium will not forget you!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这不可能！勇敢地战斗吧，我的战友们！帝国不会忘记你们！”{n}政委声音中的讥讽之意暴露无遗。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: 「そんなはずなかろう！勇敢に戦え、戦友たちよ！帝国は君たちを忘れはしないぞ！」{n}その声に混じる皮肉や嘲笑をコミッサーは隠そうともしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It can't be! Fight valiantly, my comrades-in-arms! The Imperium will not forget you!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そんなはずなかろう！勇敢に戦え、戦友たちよ！帝国は君たちを忘れはしないぞ！」{n}その声に混じる皮肉や嘲笑をコミッサーは隠そうともしない。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: "Das kann nicht sein! Kämpft tapfer, meine Kameraden! Das Imperium wird Euch nicht vergessen!" {n}Der Kommissar macht keine Anstalten, den sarkastischen Spott in seiner Stimme zu verhüllen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It can't be! Fight valiantly, my comrades-in-arms! The Imperium will not forget you!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das kann nicht sein! Kämpft tapfer, meine Kameraden! Das Imperium wird Euch nicht vergessen!" {n}Der Kommissar macht keine Anstalten, den sarkastischen Spott in seiner Stimme zu verhüllen.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: «¡No puede ser! ¡Luchad con valentía, camaradas de armas! ¡El Imperium no os olvidará!». {n}El comisario no hace ningún esfuerzo por disimular el tono sarcástico de su voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It can't be! Fight valiantly, my comrades-in-arms! The Imperium will not forget you!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No puede ser! ¡Luchad con valentía, camaradas de armas! ¡El Imperium no os olvidará!». {n}El comisario no hace ningún esfuerzo por disimular el tono sarcástico de su voz.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: "Olamaz! Yiğitçe savaşın gözü pek silah arkadaşlarım! İmparatorluk sizi unutmayacak!" {n}Komiser, sesindeki alaylı tonu gizlemeye tenezzül dahi etmiyor.{/n}
